banner.title: TP WorkLife 10/12
banner.mainContentHeadline: The podcast where science meets business
banner.mainContent: From fixing meetings to finding a mentor, get new insights to help you enjoy your time at work and thrive in your career.

videoData.title: "Healthcare Anthem of Merck KGaA, Darmstadt, Germany"
videoData.socialTitle: "Healthcare Anthem of Merck KGaA, Darmstadt, Germany"

nodes.whoTheyAre: Lars Jönnson is the pianist for Deutsche Philarmonie Merck based in Darmstadt, Germany.

videoData.description: A thoughtful ode to health care, composed by Tilo Alpermann and performed on the TED@Merck KGaA, Darmstadt, Germany stage by Lars Jönnson.
videoData.socialDescription: A thoughtful ode to health care, composed by Tilo Alpermann and performed on the TED@Merck KGaA, Darmstadt, Germany stage by Lars Jönnson.
